introduction.welcome: Welcome to RIVVLOCK, the secure escrow transaction platform. These Terms of Service (ToS) govern your use of our services.
introduction.acceptance: By creating an account and using our services, you fully and unreservedly accept these terms. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our services.

serviceDescription.main: RIVVLOCK is a financial intermediation platform that secures transactions between individuals and professionals by acting as a trusted third party. Our services include:
serviceDescription.payments: Payment processing via our partner Stripe
serviceDescription.mediation: Mediation in case of disputes between parties

serviceConditions.eligibility: Our services are accessible to any adult (18 years minimum) or legal entity capable of contracting under applicable legislation.
serviceConditions.account: Creating an account requires providing accurate and up-to-date information. You are responsible for the confidentiality of your login credentials.
serviceConditions.verification: We reserve the right to verify your identity and request supporting documents to validate your account.

feesPricing.commission: RIVVLOCK charges a 5% commission on each transaction made via the platform. This commission covers processing, security and mediation costs.
feesPricing.payment: Payment processing fees (Stripe) are included in this 5% commission.
feesPricing.included: This commission includes all service fees: fund security, customer support, dispute mediation, and banking fees.

disputesRefunds.policy: In case of dispute between parties, RIVVLOCK applies a fair refund policy based on the dispute resolution:
disputesRefunds.customerWins: • If the dispute is resolved in favor of the buyer: full 100% refund of the amount paid. RivvLock waives its share of the commission in this case, only Stripe processing fees (approximately 2.9% + €0.25) remain non-refundable.
disputesRefunds.sellerWins: • If the dispute is resolved in favor of the seller: the 5% commission is maintained and 95% is paid to the seller under normal conditions.
disputesRefunds.stripeFeesNote: Important: Stripe processing fees (approximately 2.9% + €0.25) are never refundable, in accordance with our payment partner's terms.
disputesRefunds.mediation: Our mediation service examines each dispute impartially based on evidence provided by both parties.

userResponsibilities.accurate: Provide accurate information and keep your data up to date
userResponsibilities.security: Maintain the confidentiality of your login credentials
userResponsibilities.compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
userResponsibilities.prohibited: Do not use the service for illegal or fraudulent activities

dataProtection.gdpr: We comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and protect your personal data according to the highest security standards.
dataProtection.collection: We only collect data necessary for service operation and never share it with third parties without your explicit consent.
dataProtection.rights: You have the right to access, rectify, delete and port your personal data.

intellectualProperty.ownership: RIVVLOCK and its elements (logo, interface, texts) are protected by intellectual property law. Any unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.
intellectualProperty.license: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive and revocable license to use our platform within the framework of our ToS.

liabilityLimitation.intermediary: RIVVLOCK acts as a technical and financial intermediary. We are not party to contracts concluded between users.
liabilityLimitation.limitation: Our liability is limited to the amount of commissions received for the transaction concerned.
liabilityLimitation.disputes: In case of disputes between users, we offer a mediation service but do not guarantee the resolution of all conflicts.

serviceTermination.userRight: You can terminate your account at any time via your profile settings.
serviceTermination.platformRight: We reserve the right to suspend or close an account in case of violation of these ToS or suspicious activity.
serviceTermination.consequences: Account closure does not affect ongoing transactions, which will be completed according to initial conditions.

applicableLaw.governing: These ToS are governed by French law. Any dispute will be subject to the jurisdiction of French courts.
applicableLaw.jurisdiction: In case of dispute, the courts of Paris will have sole jurisdiction.

contactSupport.questions: For any questions about these ToS or our services, contact us:
